name: KALMATRON® KF-F
description: Kalmatron® KF-F is a cementitious protective and waterproofing film-thin coating on the concrete/mortar structures also functioning as an antimicrobial agent and metal corrosion passivity coating. KF-F is applicable by spray, roll, trowel, and brash by oil paint technique to get a layer up to 2 mm or 5 /64” thick.
